channel.title: NPC dialogue question [DELTA]
channel.description:
I just came about this problem when adding the sheep's shearer quest. I'm trying to make 3 lines of npc dialogue, heres the code
case 300: talk2("What are you doing on my land? You're not the one", "who keeps leaving all my gates open", "and letting out the sheep are you?", 758); break;
I keep getting this error. [img]http://i779.photobucket.com/albums/yy71/lostmyphat/problem-1.png[/img] It's probably an easy fix but I've been coding all day my mind is burnt out and I have to go. Thanks for the help in advance.

item.title: NPC dialogue question [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @moh moh
item.description:
@moh wrote:

	public void talk3(String s, String s1, String s2, int ChatNpc, String name) {
		sendFrame200(4894, 591);
		sendFrame126(name, 4895);
		sendFrame126(s, 4896);
		sendFrame126(s1, 4897);
		sendFrame126(s2, 4898);
		sendFrame75(ChatNpc, 4894);
		sendFrame164(4893);
	}

Use as:

talk3("LINE1", "LINE2", "LINE3", NPCID, "NPCNAME");

Read full topic

item.title: NPC dialogue question [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Racist_Turtle Racist Turtle
item.description:
@Racist_Turtle wrote:

The method of talk2() requires three parameters: (String, String, int). You did (String, String, String, int). Remove one of your String’s and there you go.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC dialogue question [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

I just came about this problem when adding the sheep’s shearer quest.
I’m trying to make 3 lines of npc dialogue, heres the code

case 300: talk2("What are you doing on my land? You're not the one", "who keeps leaving all my gates open", "and letting out the sheep are you?", 758);

break;

I keep getting this error.
It’s probably an easy fix but I’ve been coding all day my mind is burnt out and I have to go. Thanks for the help in advance.
